absol.name: Feint
absol.desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging all enemies hit. Absol deals damage as if enemies hit have 0 defense and bypasses shields.

absol.name: Slash
absol.desc: Absol quickly slashes in front of themself, damaging any enemy hit by the slash. Slash has an increased cricital-hit rate.

absol.name: Night Slash
absol.desc:
Absol dashes in an arc, damaging and slowing the first Pokémon hit. If Absol hits, this ability can be activated within 6s – allowing Absol to dash again, dealing damage to all enemies hit. The second hit also has increased critical-rate based on enemy remaining HP (the lower their HP, the higher the critical-rate).

Cooldown on Hit or without recasting is 6s.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Absol heals on hit, and if the damage is a critical hit, the Heal doubles.

absol.name: Pursuit
absol.desc: Absol dashes to a location, and dashes to an enemy with its next basic attack. If Absol hits the back of the target, this ability's cooldown is reduced. If it fails to hit the back, damage is halved.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Absol gains movement speed data after the initial dash.

absol.name: Psycho Cut
absol.desc: Absol throws a wide slash in front, damaging, debuffing, and slowing enemies hit for 5s. This debuff applies extra damage the next 3 times Absol hits the debuffed Pokémon with an auto attack or a Psycho Cut.

fields.title: Debuff
fields.value: Three slash markers are added. The first two deal 2x damage when triggered, the third deals 3x damage.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases Absol's movespeed when near a debuffed enemy.

absol.name: Sucker Punch
absol.desc: Absol attacks a target Pokémon, slowing both the target and Absol. If Absol is attacked while channeling the dash, Absol takes no damage from the attack, immediately dashes to the target, and this hit does 1.5x damage and stuns the target.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases base attack speed after a successful counter.

absol.name: Midnight Slash
absol.desc: Unleash a flurry of slashes in front of Absol and become untargetable. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage shoving enemies.

blastoise.name: Water Gun
blastoise.desc: Blastoise shoots a jet of water in a straight line, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Enemies hit are also slowed for 1 second.

blastoise.name: Skull Bash
blastoise.desc: Blastoise dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit.

blastoise.name: Hydro Pump
blastoise.desc:
Blastoise shoots a large amount of water: damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit.

**During Rapid Spin**
Blastoise unleashes a large burst of water in a radius around themselves, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise also gains a small movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.

blastoise.name: Water Spout
blastoise.desc:
Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over its duration, damaging and slowing them.

**During Rapid Spin**
Blastoise rapidly unleashes bursts of water in a radius around themselves dealing up to 8 instances of damage over a short duration. Blastoise also gains a small movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.

fields.title: Damage - Area (6 Hits, 8 Hits - Rapid Spin)
Damage - Area (6 Hits, 8 Hits - Rapid Spin)

blastoise.name: Surf
blastoise.desc: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing, and once it ends, Blastoise can jump in a designated direction. The wave continues for a short duration after Blastoise has leapt off and continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Blastoise gains a small shield when hitting an enemy with Surf.

blastoise.name: Rapid Spin
blastoise.desc: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning, resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise is unstoppable for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage and slow nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next basic attack after Rapid Spin ends becomes boosted. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s Basic attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for the duration of Rapid Spin.

blastoise.name: Hydro Typhoon
blastoise.desc: Blastoise gains a shield and sweeps powerful water jets in a large circle around itself dealing massive damage and knocking enemies hit into the air.

blissey.name: Heal Pulse
blissey.desc: Blissey continually restores HP as well as the HP of a designated ally for a short time.

blissey.name: Pound
blissey.desc: Blissey pounds in a designated direction, damaging and slowing enemies hit.

blissey.name: Soft Boiled
blissey.desc: Blissey throws an egg to an ally, healing Blissey and the designated ally. Holds 3 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.

fields.title: Level 12
fields.value: Holds 4 uses in reserve instead. Cooldown is reduced by 3s.

blissey.name: Safeguard
blissey.desc: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances for 3s.

blissey.name: Egg Bomb
blissey.desc: Blissey hurls an egg at a location which explodes, damaging and throwing enemies in the radius.

fields.title: Level 10
fields.value: Also briefly slows enemies after they're thrown.

blissey.name: Helping Hand
blissey.desc: Blissey greatly improves movement speed and basic attack speed for self and allies by 35% for 3s. During this duration, all of Blissey's basic attacks are boosted. After this bonus expires, Blissey loses any boosted attack that was granted.

fields.title: Level 10
fields.value: Also increases basic attack damage for all those affected by 15%.

blissey.name: Bliss Assistance
blissey.desc: Blissey dashes to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

charizard.name: Flame Burst
charizard.desc: Charizard attacks with a bursting flame forward, exploding on the first enemy hit, dealing damage and burning enemies in a small radius. Charizard gains a small movement speed bonus when hitting an enemy. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.

charizard.name: Fire Spin
charizard.desc: Charizard shoots a burst of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after traveling max distance, dealing damage over time and slowing enemies within the radius.

charizard.name: Flamethrower
charizard.desc: Attacks with a blast of fire, damaging and burning enemies in a line. Charizard gains a small movement speed bonus if they hit. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.

charizard.name: Fire Punch
charizard.desc: Charizard punches forward, damaging and shoving enemies in their path. The first enemy hit is burned. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Cooldown reduces every time Charizard hits with a basic attack.

charizard.name: Fire Blast
charizard.desc: Charizard shoots a blast of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after a short distance, dealing damage over time and slowing enemies while within the radius.

charizard.name: Flare Blitz
charizard.desc: Charizard charges forward, shielding itself, damaging and knocking back the targeted enemy.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Also slows enemies for a short time after thrown.

charizard.name: Seismic Slam
charizard.desc: Grab an enemy and slam it onto the ground, damaging the enemy and dealing additional damage based on their max HP. Then, fly up into the air moving freely over obstacles. While this move is active, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. When dealing damage to an enemy or when burning them during this move, recover HP equal to 80% of the damage dealt.

cinderace.name: Ember
cinderace.desc: Cinderace shoots out a small flame, damaging and applying burn to hit enemies.

cinderace.name: Low Sweep
cinderace.desc: Cinderace makes a swift low sweep in the designated direction, damaging any enemy it hits.

cinderace.name: Pyro Ball
cinderace.desc: Cinderace kicks a ball of flame in a designated direction, burning and damaging enemies hit. The burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5%.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint by 2s when this move hits.

cinderace.name: Blaze Kick
cinderace.desc: Cinderace performs a fiery flying kick; shoving, burning, and critting enemies hit. In addition, Cinderace is immune to hindrances while using this move. The burn lasts 3s and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5%.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Increases Cinderace's basic attack speed for a short time after this move hits.

cinderace.name: Flame Charge
cinderace.desc: Cinderace charges forward, damaging all enemies hit.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: The next boosted attack after this move ends also slows enemies hit for a short time.

cinderace.name: Feint
cinderace.desc: Cinderace dodges, increasing movement speed for 2s and becoming briefly invincible for .5s.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: After dodging, the next 3 basic attacks that hit restore HP equal to 30% of Attack.

cinderace.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
cinderace.desc: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated enemy for a sure hit, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Apply 2 stacks of cinder on the target. Deal additional damage if the target is burning. Consume all stacks of cinder for an increased damage multiplier. Note: Deals the most damage at 3 stacks of cinder, not the max of 4.

cramorant.name: Whirlpool
cramorant.desc: Cramorant creates a whirlpool at a designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius. It also slows enemies by 50% in the area at the end of its duration. Cramorant can enter the whirlpool to catch prey for Gulp Missile (you can catch up to 2 prey).

cramorant.name: Feather Dance
cramorant.desc: Cramorant throws a circle of feathers at a designated area, slowing enemies by 20% in the radius and reducing their attack speed by 30%.

cramorant.name: Hurricane
cramorant.desc: Cramorant creates a fierce wind, damaging and throwing enemies caught in the radius.

cramorant.name: Air Slash
cramorant.desc: Cramorant shoots many blades of air while moving backwards, dealing damage to enemies within the cone. This move's cooldown is reduced for every blade that hits.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Heals Cramorant every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

cramorant.name: Surf
cramorant.desc: Cramorant sends a wave in a designated direction, damaging enemies that make contact with the wave. Once it reaches its full distance, the wave bounces back – further damaging and pulling back affected enemies. Cramorant catches prey with the first wave, and can enter the wave that returns to catch prey for Gulp Missile.

cramorant.name: Dive
cramorant.desc:
Cramorant turns the designated area into a puddle, then dives to that area, shoving and damaging enemies in the area. Cramorant catches prey for Gulp Missile as they emerge from the puddle. Holds 3 uses in reserve.

There is a 1.5 sec cooldown between charges, which is reduced with cooldown reduction.

cramorant.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
cramorant.desc: Cramorant becomes unstoppable and fires a series of Arrokuda missles at the nearest enemy, becoming immobile for the entire duration. Gatling Gulp Missile can be cancelled early.

crustle.name: Rock Slide
crustle.desc: Crustle drops rocks in a small radius, stunning enemies hit for 1s.

crustle.name: Fury Cutter
crustle.desc: Crustle attacks once with his claws. Enemies hit by Fury Cutter receive a debuff that causes subsequent Fury Cutter attacks to deal 20% additional damage. Maximum 2 debuff stacks. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.

crustle.name: Rock Tomb
crustle.desc: Crustle emits a beam that deals 100% ability damage. Upon reaching its maximum distance, or hitting an enemy, a curved wall rises from the ground, dealing 50% ability damage to all enemies on top of it. When the barrier de-spawns, 50% ability damage is dealt again to all enemies near it.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Each hit additionally inflicts 2s of slow.

crustle.name: Shell Smash
crustle.desc: Crustle smashes his shell, setting his Def and SpD to 0, gaining a boost to his Atk and SpA equal to 40% of the Def and SpD lost, respectively. Def and SpD not from base stats, i.e. from items and buffs (including Crustle's passive) are exempt. Crustle also gains a significant speed boost and becomes briefly unstoppable while activing this move.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Def and SpD conversion is increased from 40% to 50%.

crustle.name: Stealth Rock
crustle.desc: Crustle aims and creates a radius in which rocks hit enemies 8 times. Each hit applies a stack of a debuff which causes subsequent hits to deal 15% more damage. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Number of hits increased from 8 to 10.

crustle.name: X-Scissor
crustle.desc: Crustle attacks three times with his claws, dealing increased damage with each hit and knocking back enemies with each hit. Stuns for 2s if the enemy is against a wall when the third hit lands.

crustle.name: Rubble Rouser
crustle.desc: Summon a whirlwind of rocks for a short time, gaining a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP) and leaving nearby enemies unable to act. Deal damage to nearby enemies - and If Crustle receives damage while this move is in effect, deal additional revenge damage.

decidueye.name: Leafage
decidueye.desc: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage in a cone to enemies hit (only hits once). For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack is increased by 10% (this also affects Leafage) and basic attack speed is increased by 25%.

decidueye.name: Astonish
decidueye.desc: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed by 80% for a short time.

decidueye.name: Razor Leaf
decidueye.desc: Summons whirling razor leaves.  While active, Decidueye's basic attack is replaced by a new basic attack that targets all enemies in range, as well as increasing Attack by 10% and basic attack speed.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value:
Increases basic attack damage by 2% of enemies remaining HP.

This damage only applies once per attack, not on each of the 3 boosted quills.

decidueye.name: Spirit Shackle
decidueye.desc: Charges power before firing a large arrow in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged (with 6 breakpoints), but movement speed is decreased by 25% while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected enemy has their movement speed is decreased by 80% for a short time while in the area, and receives damage upon leaving the area.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Deals 15% increased damage to enemies with less than 50% remaining HP.

decidueye.name: Leaf Storm
decidueye.desc: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed by 30% for a short time. At point-blank range, it also shoves enemies hit.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Increases the length of time that the movement speed of enemies is decreased.

decidueye.name: Shadow Sneak
decidueye.desc: Creates a shadow that takes hold of one enemy in the area of effect, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 30%, decreasing their Defense by 60%, and increasing Decidueye’s movement speed by 70% for a short time.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Defense reduction of enemies is increased to 80%.

decidueye.name: Nock Nock
decidueye.desc: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies but does not pierce through them. The move ends by unleashing a large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits. While using this move, Decidueye becomes immune to hindrances but is unable to move. (This move currently is not adding % HP damage like it states in-game).

dragonite.name: Twister
dragonite.desc: Creates a twister and releases it in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

dragonite.name: Dragon Breath
dragonite.desc: Exhale a mighty gust in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, the user's next attack becomes a boosted attack.

dragonite.name: Dragon Dance
dragonite.desc: Dash in a designated direction, in one of three cycling patterns. After using this move, grant a buff increasing attack speed of the next 3 basic attacks, increasing movement speed, increasing Attack by 8% (capping at 24%), as well as increasing the stage of Hyper Beam. This buff stacks up to 3 times, and the duration is reset to full on reuse. All stacks are removed after a few seconds. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1s.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Further increases movement speed if there are opposing Pokémon nearby when the dance ends.

dragonite.name: Extreme Speed
dragonite.desc: Dash toward the designated location stopping upon contact with an enemy, dealing damage and throwing them.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: If the user's movement speed is currently decreased when it uses this move, that movement speed decrease is negated before the move is used.

dragonite.name: Hyper Beam
dragonite.desc: Fires a beam of energy toward the targeted enemy after a delay, dealing damage to all enemies that it hits, as well as additional damage based on their Max HP. The move changes Stages based on the number of stacks of Dragon Dance that Dragonite has, from 0 to 3. The Max HP damage is 5%/10%/15%/20%, determined by the current Stage.  Dragonite cannot act while releasing the beam.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Reduces damage taken by 50% while charging this move.

dragonite.name: Outrage
dragonite.desc: Dragonite stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in an area around Dragonite with the bonus effect of the last Boosted Attack he used. Additionally, Dragonite gains a buff for 5 seconds, converting all of their attacks into melee Boosted Attacks, alternating through the water, electric, and fire Boosted Attacks in order. When the buff ends, Dragonite is briefly stunned.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Reduces the duration of hindrances on the user while rampaging

dragonite.name: Draco Impact
dragonite.desc: Briefly fly up in the air before crashing down with several comets on a designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies in the area. The farther Dragonite flies, the more the Unite guage is consumed (25% at min disatance and 100% at max). Dragonite is unstoppable while using this move.

eldegoss.name: Leafage
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss shoots a bundle of leaves that explode on the first enemy hit, damaging and slowing in an area.

eldegoss.name: Synthesis
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss uses sunlight to heal itself and nearby allies.

eldegoss.name: Pollen Puff
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss throws a puff of pollen, which attaches to any Pokémon that touches it. After a delay the puff will explode, damaging enemies and healing allies around it.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: If attached to an enemy, the puff will deal damage over time. If attached to an ally, it will reduce the damage they receive by 20% for 2s.

eldegoss.name: Leaf Tornado
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss conjures a tornado full of leaves, which damages enemies and creates a gust of wind that increases the movement speed of allies that touch it. When the tornado reaches max distance, it damages enemies near it a second time.

fields.title: Damage - Second Hit
fields.value: 25% of the damage of the first hit.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Enemies hit by the tornado will miss all of their basic attacks for a small amount of time.

eldegoss.name: Cotton Guard
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss creates barriers out of cotton, granting itself and all nearby allies a shield. When the shield expires, it restores HP equal to 30% of the remaning shield value.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Also briefly increases Eldegoss's movement speed

eldegoss.name: Cotton Spore
eldegoss.desc: Eldegoss channels, gathering spores while increasing its movement speed. At the end of the channel the spores are released, damaging and throwing nearby enemies into the air, then slowing them when they land.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Eldegoss gains increased defense and special defense while channeling.

eldegoss.name: Cotton Cloud Crash
eldegoss.desc: Float into the air and become invincible. If used again, pound the ground, attacking and shoving enemies while restoring HP to allies in the radius.

garchomp.name: Sand Attack
garchomp.desc: Garchomp hurls sand toward a designated area, reducing enemy visibility and slowing them for 2s. Garchomp's movement speed and basic attack speed are increased if an enemy is hit.

garchomp.name: Bulldoze
garchomp.desc: Garchomp stomps the ground forcefully, dealing damage in a radius.

garchomp.name: Dig
garchomp.desc: Garchomp quickly dives underground in a short dash, then bursts from the ground at the end of the designated area or beneath the first enemy hit, dealing damage in a small radius and throwing enemies into the air.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Defenses are increased by 350 for a short time after jumping out of the ground.

garchomp.name: Dragon Rush
garchomp.desc: Garchomp jumps back, and briefly channels before diving forward, dragging all enemies within a small radius to the designated area, then dealing damage in a radius. Garchomp can use Dragon Claw during the first half of the channel to provide two more hits and replace the radial damage at the end of the move with a damaging stun.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Slows enemies for a short time when they are shoved the maximum distance.

garchomp.name: Earthquake
garchomp.desc: Garchomp jumps and crashes forcefully to the ground, dealing damage in a wide radius. After the initial damage, two aftershocks occur in the designated area, each dealing less damage than the initial move.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Slows enemies for a short time if they are in the radius

garchomp.name: Dragon Claw
garchomp.desc: Garchomp viciously claws everything in the designated area twice. The first attack deals damage and pushes enemies. The second attack deals increased damage, in a range slightly larger than the designated area. Basic attack speed is increased for a short time if this attack hits an enemy.

garchomp.name: Livid Outrage
garchomp.desc: Garchomp goes berzerk, taking 30% less damage and unleashing a powerful, unstoppable chain attack. Garchomp dashes and deals damage in the designated area five times, taking a brief moment to aim before every attack. Every attack has a different designated area and does more damage than the last. The fifth and final attack stuns Garchomp for .5 seconds, and throws all enemies hit into the air.

gardevoir.name: Confusion
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir fires a piercing bolt, damaging enemies.

gardevoir.name: Teleport
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir teleports to a targeted area and gains a boosted attack.

gardevoir.name: Psyshock
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir channels three attacks at the targeted area, damaging enemies. Gardevoir's moves' cooldowns is reduced each time it hits an enemy.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Each hit of Psyshock also increases the damage of the next hit.

gardevoir.name: Future Sight
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir creates a delayed explosion at the targeted area, damaging enemies. If Future Sight hits an enemy player (not wild), the cooldown is reduced by half and Gardevoir gains a burst of movement speed.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Cooldown is reset on successful hits.

gardevoir.name: Psychic
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir fires a blast, damaging enemies in an area on impact. The blast creates a lingering field that damages and slows. Each time Psychic deals damage it reduces the target’s Special Defense by 20%, up to 60%.

gardevoir.name: Moonblast
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir moves back while firing a blast, stunning the first enemy hit and damaging all enemies in a cone behind it.

gardevoir.name: Fairy Singularity
gardevoir.desc: Gardevoir warps space in a large area, creating a field stunning, pulling, and damaging all enemies in the radius. When it expires, the field damages and shoves enemies.

gengar.name: Will-O-Wisp
gengar.desc: Gengar shoots 3 wisps of flame in a cone, damaging and burning enemies hit. This burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 10%. A single enemy can only be damaged by a maximum of 2 wisps. Damage is halved if the target is burning.

gengar.name: Lick
gengar.desc: Gengar attacks forward in a line with their tongue, damaging enemies hit, and pulling them to Gengar. The next basic attack is boosted.

gengar.name: Shadow Ball
gengar.desc: Gengar hurls a shadowy ball forward in a line - damaging, slowing, and reducing the SpD of enemies hit. This ball pierces through wild Pokémon.

gengar.name: Sludge Bomb
gengar.desc: Gengar hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, poisoning and damaging enemies over time in the radius. Poison damage cannot exceed 120 per tick.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Increased area duration by 1s (adds 2 additional ticks)

gengar.name: Dream Eater
gengar.desc: Gengar shoots forward a mysterious orb, sleeping enemies when it hits. If used again when a nearby enemy is asleep, Gengar teleports behind them and attacks: dealing damage to the enemy, healing Gengar, and reducing the cooldown of Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb. Before and after teleporting, the next basic attack is boosted.

gengar.name: Hex
gengar.desc: Gengar vanishes and teleports to a designated location, damaging enemies in a radius where Gengar appears. If this hits an enemy afflicted with a status condition, damage dealt is doubled and Hex cooldown is reduced. The next basic attack is boosted.

gengar.name: Phantom Ambush
gengar.desc: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking - gaining increased movement speed, become invisible, and the next basic attack is boosted. Moves can be used while invisible, but bring you above the ground. While above the ground, become visible to the enemies. If this move is used again, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time.

greedent.name: Tackle
greedent.desc: Leap to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If this move is used while Covet is active, no area can be designated for the user to leap to. Instead, while the user is running, damage is dealt in an area to enemies in front of Greedent. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Tackle's cooldown for each berry consumed.

greedent.name: Defense Curl
greedent.desc: Grants Greedent a shield (15% max HP) for a short time. In addition, an Oran berry will drop in front of Greedent.

greedent.name: Stuff Cheeks
greedent.desc: Greedent drops several Oran berries, which can be eaten to recover HP. Any HP recovered from an Oran berry eaten within 5s that exceeds Greedent's max HP will be converted to a shield. If Greedent catches sight of a berry while using this move, movement speed is increased for a short time.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Increase the number of Oran berries dropped.

greedent.name: Covet
greedent.desc:
Greedent runs with all its might for 6s, becoming unstoppable and dealing damage to enemies hit and throwing them. While running, Greedent drops Oran berries. Eating a dropped berry increases movement speed for a short time. The more berries eaten, the more movement speed is increased. In addition, Tackle, Belch or Bullet Seed can also be used while running and using this move will reset the cooldown of Tackle or Belch.

This damage is mitigated by Defense.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Increased damage dealt and increased frequency of Oran berries dropping.

greedent.name: Bullet Seed
greedent.desc: Spit berry seeds in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. The more Oran berries Greedent has stashed, the more damage this move deals.

greedent.name: Belch
greedent.desc: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Greedent has any Oran berries stashed, consume all of them, reducing Belch's cooldown for each berry consumed.

greedent.name: Berry Belly Flop
greedent.desc: Greedent eats an Oran berry to recover HP and then leaps to the designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the area of effect. Greedent then eats a special berry, allowing an unlimited amount of Oran berries to be stored for a short time and resets cooldowns of all moves.

greninja.name: Bubble
greninja.desc: Greninja launches 2 bubbles which pop when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing them.

greninja.name: Substitute
greninja.desc: Greninja dashes while leaving behind a targetable decoy. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.

greninja.name: Double Team
greninja.desc: Greninja briefly vanishes before dashing and sending clones in different directions. The clones can attack nearby targets. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.

greninja.name: Smokescreen
greninja.desc: Greninja becomes invisible, leaving behind a cloud of smoke while dashing and gaining bonus movement speed. Greninja's next attack is boosted and deals 5% increased damage. Greninja is unstoppable while dashing.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Also increases Greninja's attack by 20% for 3s when leaving stealth.

greninja.name: Water Shuriken
greninja.desc: Greninja throws 3-5 shurikens made of water which explode when they hit an enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in a small area while healing Greninja.

greninja.name: Surf
greninja.desc: Greninja dashes on a wave, damaging enemies (capped at 1200) and healing themself for each enemy hit. Enemies below half health are dealt bonus damage (capped at 600), and if this move KOs an enemy the cooldown is reset.

greninja.name: Waterburst Shuriken
greninja.desc: Throw a giant water shuriken toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when this move hits. The water shuriken then immediately explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air. Once this move ends, Greninja may jump in a designated direction.
